column5: Well since I down sized from the bassboat to 14 foot jon I decided I did not need the Jeep any longer...  Always wanted one of these and I aint getting any younger....
Wouldn't this make it hard to pull the boat out? just being as your truck will be in the lake? I am only asking because I have a hitch for my 2011 Jetta and I am worried about that same issue.
With an aluminum you just gotta get it near the water and shove it off lol.
No, get the 2 door Challenger Hemi. Put studded tires on, no problem.
I did look at a hemi Charger Daytona "Top Banana" but I did not look good in yellow....
have one on the lot be perfect for you, has a cats head on the side
